summary: Pack of meshes with enabled parallax and other fixes
descriptionHtml:
[size=1][i]Sorry for bad English, its not my native language.[/i][/size]

Changelog:
08/01/15 - Meshes - Whiterun v1
09/01/15 - Parallax height map for Hectrol CAVES
09/03/15 - Meshes - Shack and stockades v1

[center][color=#ffd966]Parallax Fix Project - Meshes - Shack and stockades[/color][/center]
Pack of meshes of shacks and stockades with enabled parallax.  Its modders resource, requires xxx_p.dds for work properly or you got shifting textures and glitches.

List of textures used by meshes:
textures\dungeons\ships\...
textures\clutter\stockade\...
textures\smim\architecture\shackkit\...
textures\architecture\riften\RiftenLogDetails01.dds
textures\architecture\riften\RiftenCanalPlanks01.dds
textures\architecture\edgetrim\WoodEdgeTrim01.dds
textures\dungeons\caves\CaveBasePlants01.dds
textures\architecture\riften\RiftenRope01.dds


[center][color=#ffd966]Parallax height map for Hectrol CAVES DELUXE HighRes Retex[/color][/center]
Parallax height map textures for awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29145/]Hectrol CAVES DELUXE HighRes Retex[/url], just leave it here.
Works best with (and require) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661/]Parallax Meshes Dungeons Cave Green by Pfuscher aka Zerwas1[/url]


[center][color=#ffd966]Parallax Fix Project - Meshes - Whiterun[/color][/center]
Pack of meshes of Whiterun city with enabled parallax mostly everywhere. Made for myself, but decide to share it.  Its [u]modders resource[/u], [u]requires xxx_p.dds for work properly[/u] or you got shifting textures and glitches. I doesn’t touch rugs, lods, drapery things. Must be compatible with SMIM and USKP. Screenshots made with low quality height map for testing, its didn’t show real quality of parallax.
[color=#00ff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Comparison in numbers:
Vanilla - 790 nifs;
Project Parallax - 142 nifs;
Pfuschers Parallax Meshes Whiterun - 791 nifs (interiors mostly not modified, contain not modified nifs);
My Fix - 718 nifs;
[color=#00ff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
More meshes is cooking...
[color=#00ff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Permissions:
Take it, hold it, love it ;) just leave a credits if u can...
[color=#00ff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Requirements:
[url=http://enbdev.com]ENB Series[/url]
[color=#00ff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Useful tools:
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url]
[url=http://www.nvidia.ru/object/windows_texture_viewer.html]Windows Texture Viewer[/url]
[url=https://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-texture-tools-adobe-photoshop]NVIDIA Texture Tools for Adobe Photoshop[/url]
[url=http://www.crazybump.com]Crazy Bump[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859]Tes5Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.creationkit.com]Creation Kit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51491]Parallax Tutorial[/url]
[color=#00ff00]-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
